title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset their password from Settings > Security. A confirmation email will be sent.

title: Refund Policy
content: Customers may request refunds within 30 days if the item is unused and in original condition.

title: Account Deletion
content: Users can permanently delete their account by visiting account settings and confirming deletion.

title: Subscription Renewal
content: Subscriptions renew automatically every 30 days unless cancelled before the billing cycle.

title: Two Factor Authentication
content: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security using OTP verification.
